content.text: Match ends, Aston Villa 2, Southampton 4.
Second Half ends, Aston Villa 2, Southampton 4.
Attempt missed. Ashley Westwood (Aston Villa) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left following a corner.
Attempt blocked. Alan Hutton (Aston Villa) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jack Grealish with a cross.
Corner,  Aston Villa. Conceded by Dusan Tadic.
Attempt saved. Scott Sinclair (Aston Villa) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Rudy Gestede.
Goal!  Aston Villa 2, Southampton 4. Sadio Mané (Southampton) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Cédric Soares with a cross.
Shane Long (Southampton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Kevin Toner (Aston Villa).

Foul by Steven Davis (Southampton).
